text: Punam Anand Keller is the Charles Henry Jones Third Century Professor of Management at Tuck School of Business, Dartmouth College. In 2018, she was named a fellow of the Association for Consumer Researchhttps://www.acrwebsite.org/web/core-activities/acr-fellow- awardees.aspx. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Dartmouth College faculty Category:American economists Category:American women economists Category:Northwestern University alumni
title: Punam Anand Keller
